item.title: Sean Gunn Confirms His Superman Movie Role, What James Gunn Told Him He Could Say And Addresses Playing The Same DC Character As Pedro Pascal
item.description: James Gunn's brother, Sean Gunn, confirms his new DCU role in the upcoming Superman movie and addresses playing the same DC character as Pedro Pascal.

item.description: Awkwafina plays a new character introduced in Kung Fu Panda 4 who could very well be the star of the hit animated movie franchise moving forward.

item.title: Bucky Barnes Being A Congressman In Thunderbolts* Was "A Kevin Feige Thing" Explains Movie Writer
item.description: EXCLUSIVE: Bucky Barnes's congressman storyline gets explained by Thunderbolts* writer Eric Pearson as he confirms Kevin Feige came up with it.
